name: Homosexuality public opinion – Pew Research (2013)
title: Homosexuality public opinion – Pew Research (2013)
description:
Notes The full question asked: Which one of these comes closest to your opinion, number 1 or number 2?...
#1 - Homosexuality should be accepted by society; or
#2 - Homosexuality should not be accepted by society For some countries the survey is not representative at the national level.

fields.name: Share who think homosexuality should not be accepted by society
